"【贖罪の山羊】<br>仮テキスト": "Oh, good! You're still alive, so that means we can talk again. Hehehehe."
"Did you join the last fight against Mr. Dark Falz?"
"Wasn't that just wonderful?! Lisa was so, so, SO excited that... Well, she might've gone a bit overboard."
"But the ARKS were so, so, SO joyful afterwards that it kind of made Lisa laugh without realizing it."
"You know, during that idol lady's... performance? Propaganda? Lisa isn't sure what to call it."
"For the first time in ages, Lisa felt what it's like to lose. Lisa was outdone by that ridiculous enemy without even considering it was a possibility."

"Maybe that performance is a way for everyone to try and ignore the fact that Mr. Dark Falz got away, but...
It doesn't work."
"Not for Lisa, anyways. There's no way Lisa could forget an enemy she had so much fun trying to kill, you know?"
"You agree, right? You feel the same way as Lisa, don't you? Hehehe. Hehehehehe!"
